known_issues: Build failed when attempting to remove booking page backend code

existing_features.title: Update the website name from 'Ajay Labour Service' to a new name specified by the user. Update all occurrences in frontend files including SEO metadata, page titles, headers, footers, and About page content.

Add 'Daily Labour Service' as a new service offering on the Services page. Include a dedicated section with service description, features, typical use cases, and worker qualifications similar to existing service categories (mason, electrician, plumber, painter, construction helper, daily wage labour).
Ensure the 'Daily Labour Service' is accessible from the homepage services preview section and includes appropriate call-to-action buttons linking to the detailed service information.
